content: FYI: The week after next @Jack Wrenn and I will be presenting the latest on safe transmute to the language team. We'll be talking about mem-markers and Typic as two (not mutually exclusive) approaches to the problem and see if we can get help pushing the initiative forward.
hey ryan, will the recording be published? i just learned about about this safe transmute project via a question i just asked in urlo (shorturl.at/dtx78). excited to see what comes out of this group!
@Jack Wrenn just saw the new commits to Typic. Looks really great! Looking forward to discussing this in a little bit at the language team meeting
Thanks! This meeting was the push I needed to wrap up a revamp that's been months in the works.
